Package gov.va.isaac.gui.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CopyableLabel
    A Label that supports copying.
    CustomClipboard
    CustomClipboard A wrapper simplifying access to a Clipboard object.
    DragResizer
    DragResizer can be used to add mouse listeners to a Region and make it resizable by the user by clicking and dragging the border in the same way as a window.
    ErrorMarkerUtils
    ErrorMarkerUtils Convenience methods to wrap a control (textfield, combobox, etc) in a stack pane that has an error/info marker icon, and a tooltip that explains the reason why the marker is there.
    ExpandedNode
    ExpandedNode Just a silly class to store the hierarchy of an expanded tree for later replication.
    FxUtils
    Helper class encapsulating various Java FX helper utilities.
    GridPaneBuilder
    A utility for assembling a GridPane.
    StringListCell
    A ListCell for rendering String items.
    ToolTipDefaultsFixer
    ToolTipDefaultsFixer
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Images
    Common images for the taxonomy viewer.
